# PlaiGround

PlaiGround is an on-line platform for the collection of conversational data and human interactions with artificial intelligent agents using Minecraft.

## Components

PlaiGround comprises of these components:

- [Service](Service/Getting-Started.md)
- [Minecraft Plugin](/McPlugin/Set-Up.md)
- [Agent Toolkit](AgentToolkit/Getting-Started.md)


## Instructions on how to play games

- [Set up the experiment](./Data-Collection-How-To.md)
- [Set up the Minecraft client](./McPlugin/Client-Set-Up.md)


## Sequence Diagrams
